rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with a welcoming vestibule and storage space. Designed for smooth transition from the garden to the living area.
Open-plan living room adjoining kitchen area; large windows for natural light and garden view. Mediterranean style with stone accents.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with living area featuring modern appliances and Mediterranean design elements.
Guest bedroom with ample storage and privacy. Designed for relaxation and comfort.
Bathroom attached to guest room for convenience.
Service area including utility rooms and storage spaces. Designed keeping in mind the local building norms.

openings.description: Large north-facing entrance door with reinforced design meeting local building standards.
Largely glazed windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.
Staircase leading to the upper level with safety railings and compliance with building norms.
